Request for membership User Group SDC

First make sure that you have a (free) github account. Then you have two options:

  • Fill in this form
  • or add a comment to this issue.

News

April 7, 2021
A Windows 64 bit compiled release of version 5.1.5 build 3 of μ-argus is now available. This version is able to deal with larger datasets when applying Targeted Record Swapping as compared to the 32 bit release.

January 22, 2021
NEW RELEASE: Version 5.1.5 build 3 of μ-argus is now available. This version includes Targeted Record Swapping. The GUI for using this method is still under development, but the basic functionality of TRS is now available.

August 14, 2020
Small issue with the latest release (4.2.0 build 5) of τ-argus when installed in a directory that contains spaces (e.g., C:\Program Files (x86)). Two possible solutions:

  • Install in a directory without spaces
    or
  • Replace the ArgusLib.jar in the lib-subdirectory of your τ-argus installation, by the one in this zipfile

The next release will be able to deal with directories with spaces again.

June 5, 2020
NEW RELEASE: Version 4.2.0 build 5 of τ-argus is now available. This version includes noise addition using the Cell Key Method for frequency count tables as well as magnitude tables.
